definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be light, shining (Ar. zahara zahura shine, adj. 0’azharu bright (cf. Lag:BN 120); Aram. [[זְהַר]], zhar; NH in deriv.; v. also sub II. [[זהר]])—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: intrans. (late) send out light, shine, fig. of everlasting glory of teachers of righteousness: [[וְהַמַּשְׂכִּלִים יַוְהִרוּ כְּזׁהַר הָרָקִיעַ]] Da 12:3 and they that make wise shall shine like the shining of the firmament (‖[[וּמַחְדִּיקֵי הָרַבִּים כַּכּוֹכָבִים לְעוֹלָם וׇעֶד]]).
